title: Foldera CLI
description: A fast, customizable command-line tool to scaffold Node.js, Full stack and many more projects, build with purpose to automate tasks.

title: Fetchout API
description: Developer-friendly API hub with login, secure API keys, and ready-to-use public APIs (weather, jokes, etc.).

title: Pinterest Clone
description: Full-stack Pinterest inspired app with JWT auth, image sharing, user profiles, protected routes.

title: Rate Limit API
description: Node.js API rate limiter with authentication, validity checks, and secure access.
